Game.Name: My Animal Centre in Africa (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: My Animal Centre in Africa is a Virtual Life game, developed by Zeal and published by Koch Media, which was released in Europe in 2006.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/958475.html
Game.Notes: My Animal Centre in Africa is a Strategy game, developed by Zeal and published by Koch Media, which was released in Europe in 2006.
